019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager;
020
021import com.google.gson.JsonArray;
022import com.google.gson.JsonObject;
023import com.google.gson.JsonPrimitive;
024import freemarker.core.ParseException;
025import freemarker.template.Configuration;
026import freemarker.template.DefaultObjectWrapperBuilder;
027import freemarker.template.MalformedTemplateNameException;
028import freemarker.template.TemplateException;
029import freemarker.template.TemplateExceptionHandler;
030import freemarker.template.TemplateHashModel;
031import freemarker.template.TemplateNotFoundException;
032import io.kubernetes.client.custom.V1Patch;
033import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
034import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.DynamicKubernetesApi;
035import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.DynamicKubernetesObject;
036import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.options.PatchOptions;
037import java.io.IOException;
038import java.io.StringWriter;
039import java.util.Collections;
040import java.util.HashMap;
041import java.util.Map;
042import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.Constants.APP_NAME;
043import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.Constants.VM_OP_GROUP;
044import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.Constants.VM_OP_NAME;
045import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.Constants.VM_OP_VERSION;
046import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.util.ExtendedObjectWrapper;
047import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
048import org.jgrapes.core.Component;
049import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
050
051/**
052 * Adapts Kubenetes resources to changes in VM definitions (CRs). 
053 */
054@SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis",
055    "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals" })
056public class Reconciler extends Component {
057
058    private final Configuration fmConfig;
059
060    /**
061     * Instantiates a new reconciler.
062     *
063     * @param componentChannel the component channel
064     */
065    public Reconciler(Channel componentChannel) {
066        super(componentChannel);
067
068        // Configure freemarker library
069        fmConfig = new Configuration(Configuration.VERSION_2_3_32);
070        fmConfig.setDefaultEncoding("utf-8");
071        fmConfig.setObjectWrapper(new ExtendedObjectWrapper(
072            fmConfig.getIncompatibleImprovements()));
073        fmConfig.setTemplateExceptionHandler(
074            TemplateExceptionHandler.RETHROW_HANDLER);
075        fmConfig.setLogTemplateExceptions(false);
076        fmConfig.setClassForTemplateLoading(Reconciler.class, "");
077    }
078
079    /**
080     * Handles the change event.
081     *
082     * @param event the event
083     * @param channel the channel
084     * @throws ApiException the api exception
085     * @throws IOException 
086     * @throws ParseException 
087     * @throws MalformedTemplateNameException 
088     * @throws TemplateNotFoundException 
089     * @throws TemplateException 
090     * @throws KubectlException 
091     */
092    @Handler
093    public void onVmDefChanged(VmDefChanged event, WatchChannel channel)
094            throws ApiException, TemplateNotFoundException,
095            MalformedTemplateNameException, ParseException, IOException,
096            TemplateException {
097        DynamicKubernetesApi vmDefApi = new DynamicKubernetesApi(VM_OP_GROUP,
098            VM_OP_VERSION, event.crd().getName(), channel.client());
099        var defMeta = event.metadata();
100        var vmDef = vmDefApi.get(defMeta.getNamespace(), defMeta.getName())
101            .getObject();
102
103        reconcileDisks(vmDef, channel);
104        reconcileConfigMap(vmDef, channel);
105    }
106
107    private void reconcileDisks(DynamicKubernetesObject vmDef,
108            WatchChannel channel) throws ApiException {
109        var disks = GsonPtr.to(vmDef.getRaw())
110            .get(JsonArray.class, "spec", "vm", "disks")
111            .map(JsonArray::asList).orElse(Collections.emptyList());
112        int index = 0;
113        for (var disk : disks) {
114            reconcileDisk(vmDef, index++, (JsonObject) disk, channel);
115        }
116    }
117
118    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals", "PMD.ConfusingTernary" })
119    private void reconcileDisk(DynamicKubernetesObject vmDefinition,
120            int index, JsonObject diskDef, WatchChannel channel)
121            throws ApiException {
122        var pvcObject = new DynamicKubernetesObject();
123        var pvcDef = GsonPtr.to(pvcObject.getRaw());
124        var vmDef = GsonPtr.to(vmDefinition.getRaw());
125        var pvcTpl = GsonPtr.to(diskDef).to("volumeClaimTemplate");
126
127        // Copy base and metadata from template and add missing/additional data.
128        pvcObject.setApiVersion(pvcTpl.getAsString("apiVersion").get());
129        pvcObject.setKind(pvcTpl.getAsString("kind").get());
130        var vmName = vmDef.getAsString("metadata", "name").orElse("default");
131        pvcDef.get(JsonObject.class).add("metadata",
132            pvcTpl.to("metadata").get(JsonObject.class).deepCopy());
133        var defMeta = pvcDef.to("metadata");
134        defMeta.computeIfAbsent("namespace", () -> new JsonPrimitive(
135            vmDef.getAsString("metadata", "namespace").orElse("default")));
136        defMeta.computeIfAbsent("name", () -> new JsonPrimitive(
137            vmName + "-disk-" + index));
138        var pvcLbls = pvcDef.to("metadata", "labels");
139        pvcLbls.set("app.kubernetes.io/name", APP_NAME);
140        pvcLbls.set("app.kubernetes.io/instance", vmName);
141        pvcLbls.set("app.kubernetes.io/component", "disk");
142        pvcLbls.set("app.kubernetes.io/managed-by", VM_OP_NAME);
143
144        // Get API and check if PVC exists
145        DynamicKubernetesApi pvcApi = new DynamicKubernetesApi("", "v1",
146            "persistentvolumeclaims", channel.client());
147        var existing = pvcApi.get(defMeta.getAsString("namespace").get(),
148            defMeta.getAsString("name").get());
149
150        // If PVC does not exist, create. Else patch (apply)
151        if (!existing.isSuccess()) {
152            // PVC does not exist yet, copy spec from template
153            pvcDef.get(JsonObject.class).add("spec",
154                pvcTpl.to("spec").get(JsonObject.class).deepCopy());
155            pvcApi.create(pvcObject);
156        } else {
157            // spec is immutable, so mix in existing spec
158            pvcDef.set("spec", GsonPtr.to(existing.getObject().getRaw())
159                .to("spec").get().deepCopy());
160            PatchOptions opts = new PatchOptions();
161            opts.setForce(false);
162            opts.setFieldManager("kubernetes-java-kubectl-apply");
163            pvcApi.patch(pvcObject.getMetadata().getNamespace(),
164                pvcObject.getMetadata().getName(),
165                V1Patch.PATCH_FORMAT_APPLY_YAML,
166                new V1Patch(channel.client().getJSON().serialize(pvcObject)),
167                opts).throwsApiException();
168        }
169    }
170
171    private void reconcileConfigMap(DynamicKubernetesObject vmDefinition,
172            WatchChannel channel) throws TemplateNotFoundException,
173            MalformedTemplateNameException, ParseException, IOException,
174            TemplateException, ApiException {
175        // Combine template and data and parse result
176        // (tempting, but no need to use a pipe here)
177        var fmTemplate = fmConfig.getTemplate("etcConfig.ftl.yaml");
178        StringWriter out = new StringWriter();
179        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
180        Map<String, Object> model = new HashMap<>();
181        model.putAll(vmDefinition.getRaw().asMap());
182        model.put("constants",
183            (TemplateHashModel) new DefaultObjectWrapperBuilder(
184                Configuration.VERSION_2_3_32)
185                    .build().getStaticModels().get(Constants.class.getName()));
186        fmTemplate.process(model, out);
187
188        // Apply
189        PatchOptions opts = new PatchOptions();
190        opts.setForce(false);
191        opts.setFieldManager("kubernetes-java-kubectl-apply");
192        DynamicKubernetesApi pvcApi = new DynamicKubernetesApi("", "v1",
193            "configmaps", channel.client());
194        var vmDef = GsonPtr.to(vmDefinition.getRaw());
195        pvcApi.patch(vmDef.getAsString("metadata", "namespace").get(),
196            vmDef.getAsString("metadata", "name").get(),
197            V1Patch.PATCH_FORMAT_APPLY_YAML, new V1Patch(out.toString()),
198            opts).throwsApiException();
199    }
200
201}
